entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
